title: CommaFeed LXC
textContent:
CommaFeed LXC 
                CommaFeed is a
                    Google
                    Reader inspired self-hosted RSS reader.
                To create a new Proxmox VE CommaFeed LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell. 
                    To Update CommaFeed, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/commafeed.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡
                CommaFeed Interface: IP:8082
                ⚙️ Initial Login
                username admin
                password admin
outerHTML:
CommaFeed LXC

CommaFeed is a Google Reader inspired self-hosted RSS reader.

To create a new Proxmox VE CommaFeed LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update CommaFeed, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/commafeed.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

CommaFeed Interface: IP:8082

⚙️ Initial Login

username admin

password admin
